TEXTS.ITEM: * Name of the file for the container. * Depending of file type selected : * * Server : file is save on presentation server (/tmp/) * * Local : file is save on your workstation (c:\) * * Dynamic file name : * You could use special tag in the file name that will be replaced by dynamic values. Here is the list of this tags : * - <:uname:> : User ID * - <:sysid:> : SAP system ID * - <:datum:> : Running date * - <:uzeit:> : Running time * These specials tags are usefull when using mode "One Step export (4 background)". * * Example : * <:sysid:>_<:datum:>.xml is a good name for daily save * <:uname:>_ <:datum:><:uzeit:>.xml is a good name for your development saves.
